name: Supernova (itch) (beh3D)
description:
Dash through procedurally-generated levels with destructible obstacles and blast apart enemies with upgradable weapons in this EDM-themed runner/FPS hybrid!

Unlock the next levels by beating bosses, but watch out for new obstacles and faster speeds as you progress through the game. After completing 10 levels, a final boss appears and killing the final boss completes the run. An online leaderboard is included to display your high score in comparison to others. 

While I created the majority of the different elements in the game, I relied on the game development community for some of the assets. All of my sources are properly licensed and listed under "Credits" in the Options menu. Huge thank you to everyone who releases free and affordable assets for small indie devs to use in their games!

A complete run is usually around ~15 minutes. Hope you enjoy :)

I plan on adding controller compatibility in the next update. As always, feel free to comment with any ideas or criticisms- I'm always open to feedback.

UPDATE 4/16: 
- Changed the tiling colors for less visual overload
- Slowed the jump for a smoother feel
